creator: ps@nomensa.com
text:
Default publication xml sample (xhtml.xml) makes use of dc:date whereas the
addMetaData.xsl stylsheet doesn't use this but does have a dcterms:created.

The end result is each time a new default document is created the dc:date is not
updated or if the sample has a date in it it is simply copied across (so a new
document could be dated last year say).
Added lenya-dev@cocoon.apache.org to CC-list of this entry.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text: can you provide a patch to fix this?
creator: gregor@apache.org
gregor@apache.org
text: we should probably move to dcterms:created wholesale at some point
